UnactiveUserTip: User is not activated or is not allowed to login
SignupNotOpenTip: Administrator has not opened public signup
UnsetEmailTip: If you forgot or unfilled email, please contact your administrator to reset your password
VcodeEmailSent: Verification code has been sent to your mailbox
EmailAccountUnset: Mail service account is not configured, please contact administrator to configure
AdminReviewSignup: Your administrator is reviewing your signup information
SignupPending:
%s Welcome to signup! The following is your login information, please keep it safe!

Username %s
Password %s
Login URL %s

You cannot login to the system at this time because the administrator is reviewing your signup information. You will be notified by email after completion, please be patient.
AdminWillReviewSignupTip: The administrator will review your signup information, please enter carefully
SignupSuccessTip: Signup information has been submitted and the results of the review will be notified to you via email
SystemBusy: System is busy, please try again later
UnsupportIE10Tip: Browsers below IE10 are not supported, Chrome, Firefox, Edge or IE11 is recommended
ErrorUnknow: Unknow error, please try again later
Error404: The resource you requested does not exist
NewUserAddedNotify:
系统管理员已经为你开通了 %s 账号！以下为你的登录信息，请妥善保管。

登录账号 %s
登录密码 %s
登录地址 %s

首次登陆，建议你立即修改登陆密码。修改方式：登陆后点击右上角头像 - 个人设置 - 安全设置 - 更改密码
NewUserSignupNotify: 用户 @%s 提交了注册申请。请验证用户有效性后为其启用并指定部门和角色，以便用户登录使用。如果这是一个无效申请请忽略。[点击此处激活](%s)
NewUserAccountActive:
%s 你的账户已激活！现在你可以登陆并使用系统。

登录地址 %s

首次登陆，建议你立即修改密码！如有任何登陆或使用问题，请与系统管理员联系。
PasswordLevel2Tip: 密码必须包含数字和大小写字母
PasswordLevel3Tip: 密码不能小于8位，且必须包含特殊字符
